'''Dusk Bird''' is a type of bird that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

==Locations==
Can be found south of [[Apam Woods]] and northwest of [[Devantaka Mountain]].
<gallery>
Wildlife Dusk Bird Location 1.png
Wildlife Dusk Bird Location 2.png
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* Dusk Birds chirp in {{w|Morse code}}, with short chirps representing "dots" and longer trills representing "dashes."
** AYUS: {{A|VO Dusk Bird - AYUS.ogg}} · – / – · – – / · · – / · · ·
*** {{Lang|''Ayus''|sa=आयुस्|sa_rm=ayus}} most likely referring to a "long life," which is mentioned as obtainable through the worship of {{Lang|mini=1|sa=''Śiva''}}.<ref>Wisdom Library: [https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/ayus Ayus]</ref>
** DAWON: {{A|VO Dusk Bird - DAWON.ogg}} – · · / · – / · – – / – – – / – ·
*** {{w|Dawon}}, the mount of the Hindu goddess {{w|Durga}} that is either depicted as a lion or tiger.
** DESHRET: {{A|VO Dusk Bird - DESHRET.ogg}} – · · / · / · · · / · · · · / · – · / · / -
*** [[King Deshret]]
** MIHOYO: {{A|VO Dusk Bird - MIHOYO.ogg}} – – / · · / · · · · / – – – / – · – – / – – –
*** [[MiHoYo]], the game's creator.
** SARVA: {{A|VO Dusk Bird - SARVA.ogg}} · · · / · – / · – · / · · · – / · –
*** From Sanskrit {{Lang|mini=1|sa=सर्व|sa_rm=sarva|sa_tl=every, all; whole, entire.}} It is often used to refer to [[Irminsul]].
* Dusk Birds seem to be a mix between chameleons and parrots, being able to camouflage themselves as well as mimicking human speech. Its physical appearance resembles both animals.
